solution_line_template: Lucille weeded half the grass, so she pulled {grass_weeds} / {half_divisor} = <<{grass_weeds}/{half_divisor}={weeds_pulled_from_grass}>>{weeds_pulled_from_grass} weeds around the fruit frees.

She pulled {flower_bed_weeds} + {vegetable_patch_weeds} + {weeds_pulled_from_grass} = <<{flower_bed_weeds}+{vegetable_patch_weeds}+{weeds_pulled_from_grass}={total_weeds_pulled}>>{total_weeds_pulled} weeds before her break.
After buying her soda, Lucille has {total_earnings} - {soda_cost} = <<{total_earnings}-{soda_cost}={cents_left}>>{cents_left} cents left.
